about_the_game:
THE ART OF LAYERS OF FEAR

This official digital album will lead you through the unsettling world of Layers of Fear. Explore it through this beautiful collection of illustrations and concept art from the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. 
Frequent emotional violence and general mature content like psychological diseases (depression, anxiety) is present.
